name: MaryOnlyNeedsOranges
tagline: A modern version of the classic Snake game
body:
### Plans
Release on Linux and Android when the time will allow it

### Details
You can find the release file and the code on the github page.

### Reports
If you find anything wrong with the game or if you have any ideas related to the game you can contact me at danyhk94@gmail.com

### Bugs and Fixes
```
v1.0 : First release. No bugs reported
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
